text:
By June 1, 1993 and before June 1st of each year thereafter, the Mayor shall set the surcharge rate to be charged for the year, commencing the following July 1st. 
(Added by Ord. 369-92, App. 12/23/92; amended by Ord. 278-96, App. 7/3/96)
